items.sentence: Tom's face feels rough because he needs a shave.
Tom's French is far from perfect and so is mine.
Tom wasn't at school yesterday. Do you know why?
There's nothing in the refrigerator except milk.
Tom was Mary's boyfriend for about three months.
Tom was smart enough to listen to Mary's advice.
Don't you want to know what the real problem is?
Tom was sitting on the porch and reading a book.
In Tom's heart of hearts, he doesn't believe it.
Do you plan to play volleyball with us tomorrow?
